alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Lee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 2:21PM CST until January 12 at 3:15PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lee County in east central Alabama... Southern Chambers County in east central Alabama... * Until 315 PM CST. * At 221 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Still Waters Resort to near Liberty City to near Tallapoosa City, moving east at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Auburn, Opelika, Valley, Lanett, Notasulga, La Fayette, Waverly, Lakeview, Cusseta, Beulah, Beans Mill, Auburn University, River View, Sturkie, Chambers County Lake, Huguley, Fairfax, Oak Bowery, West Chambers and Loachapoka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
